title: Boy heads out to milk cows on dairy farm, found buried dead in shallow grave
itunes:title: Boy heads out to milk cows on dairy farm, found buried dead in shallow grave
description:
A heartbreaking end to the search for missing teenager Jonathon Minard. The 14-year-old was found in a shallow grave in rural Ohio. He had gone missing while walking home from helping out a friend.

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Marc Klass: Founder, Klass Kids Foundation

Joseph Scott Morgan: Forensics expert, and author of “Blood Beneath My Feet”

Randall Kessler: Defense attorney, Emory Law School Trial Professor 

John Lemley: Crime online investigative reporter


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
